name: The Dope Adventuring of a Measuring Tape
name_original: The Dope Adventuring of a Measuring Tape
description:
A game made entirely by myself for the 2018 Stop Motion Game Jam!

You are a measuring tape that needs to collect coins and kill evil enemies!

I'm sorry for not having much time to work on this game, but it was pretty fun, even though it ended up with no sounds.

Controls:

A- Rotate anti-clockwise

D- Rotate clockwise

SPACE- Extend measuring tape/ activate matchstick propeller/launch from cloud cannon

SHIFT- Double rotating speed
